title: Enhancing Instructional Design Evaluation Competencies for Corporate Science Education Programs (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental instructional design process and understanding of adult learning principles
context.additional_context: Practical evaluation training conducted in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments for science field managerial/leadership professionals

learning_goals: Analyze the instructional design of an actual corporate science education program from a macro perspective using a 10-step evaluation model.
Through the design of unbiased, objective questions in the evaluation process, the effectiveness, efficiency, and motivational elements of the program can be diagnosed.
Based on case study results, actionable recommendations for program improvement or redesign can be established.

resources: Corporate Internal Science Education Program Case Materials

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
